com.hazelcast.cp

Interface CPMember

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Endpoint

    public interface CPMember
extends Endpoint
    A CP member is a Hazelcast member that is internally elected to be part of the CPSubsystem, hence maintain CP data structures. If CPSubsystemConfig.getCPMemberCount() is configured to be N, first N members of the cluster are assigned as CP members during startup. After the CP subsystem is initialized, other Hazelcast members can be promoted to be a CP member via the CPSubsystemManagementService.promoteToCPMember() API.
    See Also:
    CPSubsystemConfig, CPSubsystemManagementService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address getAddress()
      Returns the address of this CP member.
      String getUuid()
      Returns the UUID of this CP member.

        getSocketAddress

    • Method Detail

      • getUuid

        String getUuid()
        Returns the UUID of this CP member. The CP member UUID does not have to be same with the uuid of the local member that is accessed via Cluster.getLocalMember().
        Specified by:
        getUuid in interface Endpoint
        Returns:
        the UUID of this CP Member

      • getAddress

        Address getAddress()
        Returns the address of this CP member. It is same with the address of Cluster.getLocalMember()
        Returns:
        the address of this CP member
